projects: [{"title":"Learning Management System-LUMEN","start_date":"Jan 2023","description":"Working on the in-house developed LMS-LUMEN for feature implementation and bug fixing."},{"title":"Sketchbook","start_date":"Nov 2023","end_date":"Nov 2023","description":"This is an excalidraw/miro clone made using Next.js, canvas api, and socket.io for enabling socket connections. GitHub link:- https://github.com/REEKRAJROY/Sketchbook"},{"title":"SMIT's Nest","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"May 2022","description":"This project, SMIT's Nest is built entirely on React.js and supports Pre-Rendering with Static-Site-Generation which has been implemented using Next.js. The modern UI has been designed with the help of Tailwind CSS. Most of the work is established using GraphCMS and GraphQL respectively."},{"title":"DeOldify","start_date":"Mar 2022","end_date":"Mar 2022","description":"This project aims to colorize and restore black and white still photographs and, clips using NoGAN training. ColorizeArtistic gen model from deepai.org has been used to enable working on different platforms."},{"title":"Apna Search","start_date":"Feb 2022","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"This is a web searching application similar to Google Search where users can search anything and get corresponding results, images, news, and videos. The project has been made using Reactjs, and Tailwind CSS, and the search results are fetched using Google Search API from Rapid API."},{"title":"IP address tracker","start_date":"Feb 2022","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"This is an IP Address Tracker application that gives the Location, Time Zone, and ISP of a given IP. To get the IP Address locations IP Geolocation API by IPify was used. Map has been generated using LeafletJS. React and TailwindCSS has been used to build the card and map components, and the UI respectively."},{"title":"Python IDE","start_date":"Jul 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"A Python code editor to execute .py files. Facilities like saving, opening, and compilation of files are provided. The Gui has been designed using Tkinter and factory functions implemented by tkinter.filedialog and subprocess module."}]
